attributes.additional_details:
Last couple of years BSF (Border Security Force, India)  is showing brutal attitude against Bangladesh. Last but very recent, two thrilling news was killing a girl "Felani" and a guy beaten. When they beating that guy they (BFS) take off his cloths and make him full naked and make a video clip as well.

We all hope British Government should be given at least some statement in this brutality.

and we also expect that, as world leading human rights country should take some positive step against this brutality.

In this context, request you to watch this link please:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CPDXmhZHP_8
